content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=35-41, y=-87)
Consists of following entities:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (41.0,-86.0), (39.0,-85.0), and (37.0,-85.0)
- Storage chests at positions (40.5,-87.5), (39.5,-83.5), and (36.5,-86.5)
- Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5) and (35.5,-85.5)

### Iron/Copper Mining & Smelting at position(x=-28, y=-61) 
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0)
- Storage chest at (-27.5,-59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5,-59.5)
- Stone furnaces at (-27.0,-58.0), (-23.0,-58.0), (-21.0,-58.0)
- Output chest at (-24.5,-58.5)
- Connected by burner inserters at (-25.5,-58.5), (-20.5,-59.5)

### Iron Mining Complex at position(x=-10, y=-59)
Consists of following entities:
- 3 Burner mining drills at (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Storage chests at (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Connected by transport belts and burner inserters
- Full storage chest at (-5.5,-55.5) containing 800 iron ore

### Smelting Array at position(x=0-6, y=0)
Consists of following entities:
- 4 Stone furnaces at (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Input chests at (0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), (6.5,-2.5)
- Output chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)
- Connected by burner inserters and transport belts

### Power Generation at position(x=-3.5, y=27.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Connected by pipe networks for water and steam
- Electric poles connecting power to other structures

ERROR TIPS

### Errors with pipe connections
- Ensure pipes are properly aligned and connected when setting up fluid systems
- Steam engine needs direct pipe connection to receive steam from boiler

### Errors with inserter placement
- Ensure inserters have valid pickup and drop-off positions
- Check that destination inventory/belt has space before attempting insertion

### Errors with mining drill operation
- Keep mining drills fueled to maintain operation
- Ensure output storage has available space to prevent blockages

### Errors with transport belt systems
- Clear blocked belts to maintain item flow
- Ensure proper connection between belt segments
